Code: EXEC SQL SELECT MIN(T2.DTVENCTO), MIN(T2.DTVENCTO - 6 DAYS), MIN(T2.NRPARCEL) FROM seguros.v0parcela T1, seguros.v0parcela T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND T1.NRENDOS = :NRENDOS AND T1.NUM_APOLICE = T2.NUM_APOLICE AND T1.NRENDOS = T2.NRENDOS AND T1.NRPARCEL = T2.NRPARCEL AND T1.SITUACAO = '0' ORDER BY T1.DTVENCTO END SQL
